title: Digital Analytics Specialist
content:
We are currently looking for a Digital Analytics Specialist to help clients on data-related projects. As a Digital Analytics Specialist you will lead closely with stakeholders and various client-side departments to oversee the design, development, and validation of Analytics data for various platforms such as Google Analytics free, 360 and 4. As a consultative partner, you also will advise clients on industry trends and ways to harness different technology solutions to drive long-term value.
This role focuses on the design and technical implementation of customized analytics solutions. As well as creating and running analytics platform training. The successful candidate for this opportunity will demonstrate a balance of technical, analytics, business and client management skills that go beyond platform knowledge.
The Role
Client Facing

Plan and design data analytics projects
Hands on implementation of clients’ analytics accounts including data properties, user access management, platform features, reporting and dashboarding
Provide clients best industry practices regarding the digital analytics space (data collection, computation, reporting, analysis and activation)
Collaborate with clients and internal/external stakeholders to identify analytics solution to match the customer’s business needs, help them achieve their goals and uncover opportunities to drive long-term value

Business Facing

Collaborate with internal stakeholders for analytics project management by applying set company-wide best practices and processes
Drive towards higher effective rate between client value and costs; build efficiencies into repeatable processes and scale globally
Educate Accounts, Sales, and Engineering teams on various analytics platforms to support projects fulfillment 
Train employees when needed and offer platform expertise
Define roadmap and opportunities for long-term customer analytics needs

What you bring to it:

Excellent analytical and problem solving skills with proven ability to deliver actionable insights
Ability to explain digital and data concepts proposals to non-technical audiences and communicate business value of suggested recommendations & plans
Passionate about working in an extremely fast-paced, demanding, and fluid start-up environment
5+ years hands-on experience with Google Analytics 360, Google Analytics 4 
Able to read/write basic HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and ability to query large databases with SQL
Plus: Architecture & Implementation experience with Google Analytics 360/4 and AB test tools such as Google Optimize, Adobe Target, AB tasty, Optimizely
Plus: Experience with Google Big Query, Adobe Analytics, Amplitude, Google Tag Manager, Looker Studio, Tableau and Salesforce 
Strong Written and verbal communication skills in both Korean and English

Requirements

Be located in Seoul, South Korea 
Native or fluent in Korean 
Excellent spoken and written English skills
Must have work permit for S.Korea; we will not provide visa or relocation assistance

 
What we offer:

Hybrid working culture 
20 days of annual leave 
MightyHive mobile phone plan
Company Taxi account to get you around in style
Health checkup support for every odd year from one year after joining
Birthday gift
Anniversary gift

 

Please send us your English resume

포지션 소개
 
역할
[고객 대면 영역]

데이터 분석 프로젝트 계획 및 설계
데이터 속성, 사용자 액세스 관리, 플랫폼 기능, 보고 및 대시보드를 포함한 고객의 분석 계정을 직접 구현 
고객에게 디지털 분석 공간 (데이터 수집, 계산, 보고, 분석 및 활성화)과 관련된 업계 모범사례 제공 
고객 및 내/외부 이해 관계자와 협력하여 고객의 비즈니스 요구에 맞는 분석 솔루션을 식별하고, 고객이 목표를 달성하고, 장기적인 가치 창출 기회 제공 

[고객사의 비즈니스 업무 지원 영역]

전사적인 모범사례 및 프로세스를 적용하여 분석 프로젝트 매니징을 위해 내부 이해 관계자와 협력
고객 가치와 비용 간의 효율성 향상 및 반복되는 프로세스에 전세계적으로 효율성 구축
프로젝트 관리 어카운트 분석 업무 및 회사 전반의 모범 사례 및 프로세스 설정
고객사의 비즈니스 목적 달성을 위해 플랫폼 사용 방법에 관해 다양한 부서 (어카운트, 세일즈, 엔지니어링 팀)에 교육
장기적인 클라이언트 애널리틱스 수요에 있어 로드맵과 가능성 정의 업무

 
지원 자격

Google Analytics 360, Google Analytics 4를 활용한 5년 이상 실무 경험자
대한민국에 거주하시는 분 (외국국적이신 경우 한국 취업 비자를 소지하신 분)
한국어 비즈니스 레벨로 가능 하신 분 
해외 팀원들과 영어로 소통하는 것에 두려움이 없으신 분

우대 사항

구글 애널리틱스 360/4 및 구글 태그매니저, 구글 옵티마이즈, 어도비 타겟과 같은 데이터 스튜디오 툴을 이용하여 설치 및 아키텍쳐로 2년 정도의 구현경험을 가지고 계신 분
구글 빅쿼리, 어도비 애널리틱스, 구글 태그매니저, 루커 스튜디오, Tableau 및 Salesforce에 대한 경험
기초 HTML/ CSS/ 자바스크립트 와 같은 언어 쓰기 및 읽기, SQL로 대용량 데이터베이스 쿼리 가능하신 분
비전공자분들께 디지털 및 데이터 개념을 전달 하는데에 커뮤니케이션이 능숙하신 분
빠르게 성장하는 환경에서 커리어를 쌓아나가고 싶으신 분

 
복리후생

연 20일 연차 사용가능
재택 및 출근 병행
임직원 건강검진 
핸드폰 비용 지원
생일 선물 지원
장기근속자 선물
야근시 택시비 지원

 

영문 이력서 필수 제출

#LI-CX1
 About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
Disclaimer: 


Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy

demographic_questions.description:
At Media.Monks, we believe in fostering an environment where a diversity of perspectives can thrive. We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve. We welcome and encourage qualified applicants, from all backgrounds, who are excited to contribute to our mission. 

As a step in strengthening our hiring process, we invite you to voluntarily provide information that will help inform and improve our inclusion efforts.

As a reminder, answering this question is entirely voluntary. Your response will remain confidential and intended solely for the purpose of improving our hiring process; and will not, in any way, be associated with your specific application or be used in the hiring decision.

questions.label: Will you now or in the future need visa sponsorship for the country in which you are applying?
